name: Ghost Crab Hero
description:
A short game created for the Blackthornprod Game Jam 3. #BTPGameJam

This is my first official submission to a game jam - woo hoo!  All content including sounds were made for this jam from scratch.  Which was a fun challenge since I normally work with other artists.

Ghost Crab Hero fights back against beach littering to safely escort baby sea turtles to the water.  It uses a fun yet challenging control scheme:

WASD to control but it is always relative to your mouse pointer.

Since you are a crab... going sideways activates your "ghost" power (since you are a GHOST crab...).  This prevents you from crushing the baby sea turtles on their journey to the water.

At the end if you munch up your seaweed salad rewards there is a small easter egg.

Hope you enjoy!  Tools used: Construct 3, photoshop, adobe animate, my microphone to record sounds... lol Thanks for playing :)

Cheers,

Foozle
